nodes.text: Blue Four was the callsign of the fourth member of the starfighter squadron Blue Squadron.
Clone trooper pilot "Kickback" served as Blue Four at the Battle of Ryloth. He was one of the few pilots to survive the battle.
Rebel Alliance pilot Barion Raner served as Blue Four around the time of the Battle of Scarif.
During the Battle of Jakku, a member of the New Republic's 77 Squadron (which flew as Blue Squadron in the battle) used the callsign.
Resistance pilot Pallaris Ven flew as Blue Four with astromech droid BR-BA and perished in the Battle of Starkiller Base.
